org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.rabbitmq.common

类 RMQConnectionConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.rabbitmq.common.RMQConnectionConfig
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RMQConnectionConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Connection Configuration for RMQ. If RMQConnectionConfig.Builder.setUri(String) has been set then RMQConnectionConfig(String, Integer, Boolean, Boolean, Integer, Integer, Integer, Integer) will be used for initialize the RMQ connection or RMQConnectionConfig(String, Integer, String, String, String, Integer, Boolean, Boolean, Integer, Integer, Integer, Integer) will be used for initialize the RMQ connection
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RMQConnectionConfig

        private RMQConnectionConfig(java.lang.String host,
                            java.lang.Integer port,
                            java.lang.String virtualHost,
                            java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password,
                            java.lang.Integer networkRecoveryInterval,
                            java.lang.Boolean automaticRecovery,
                            java.lang.Boolean topologyRecovery,
                            java.lang.Integer connectionTimeout,
                            java.lang.Integer requestedChannelMax,
                            java.lang.Integer requestedFrameMax,
                            java.lang.Integer requestedHeartbeat)
        参数:
        host - host name
        port - port
        virtualHost - virtual host
        username - username
        password - password
        networkRecoveryInterval - connection recovery interval in milliseconds
        automaticRecovery - if automatic connection recovery
        topologyRecovery - if topology recovery
        connectionTimeout - connection timeout
        requestedChannelMax - requested maximum channel number
        requestedFrameMax - requested maximum frame size
        requestedHeartbeat - requested heartbeat interval
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if host or virtual host or username or password is null

      • RMQConnectionConfig

        private RMQConnectionConfig(java.lang.String uri,
                            java.lang.Integer networkRecoveryInterval,
                            java.lang.Boolean automaticRecovery,
                            java.lang.Boolean topologyRecovery,
                            java.lang.Integer connectionTimeout,
                            java.lang.Integer requestedChannelMax,
                            java.lang.Integer requestedFrameMax,
                            java.lang.Integer requestedHeartbeat)
        参数:
        uri - the connection URI
        networkRecoveryInterval - connection recovery interval in milliseconds
        automaticRecovery - if automatic connection recovery
        topologyRecovery - if topology recovery
        connectionTimeout - connection timeout
        requestedChannelMax - requested maximum channel number
        requestedFrameMax - requested maximum frame size
        requestedHeartbeat - requested heartbeat interval
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if URI is null

        返回:

        public java.lang.String getVirtualHost()
        Retrieve the virtual host.
        返回:
        the virtual host to use when connecting to the broker

        Retrieve the user name.
        返回:
        the AMQP user name to use when connecting to the broker

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        Retrieve the password.
        返回:
        the password to use when connecting to the broker

      • getUri

        public java.lang.String getUri()
        Retrieve the URI.
        返回:
        the connection URI when connecting to the broker

      • getNetworkRecoveryInterval

        public java.lang.Integer getNetworkRecoveryInterval()
        Returns automatic connection recovery interval in milliseconds.
        返回:
        how long will automatic recovery wait before attempting to reconnect, in ms; default is 5000

      • isAutomaticRecovery

        public java.lang.Boolean isAutomaticRecovery()
        Returns true if automatic connection recovery is enabled, false otherwise.
        返回:
        true if automatic connection recovery is enabled, false otherwise

      • isTopologyRecovery

        public java.lang.Boolean isTopologyRecovery()
        Returns true if topology recovery is enabled, false otherwise.
        返回:
        true if topology recovery is enabled, false otherwise

      • getConnectionTimeout

        public java.lang.Integer getConnectionTimeout()
        Retrieve the connection timeout.
        返回:
        the connection timeout, in milliseconds; zero for infinite

      • getRequestedChannelMax

        public java.lang.Integer getRequestedChannelMax()
        Retrieve the requested maximum channel number.
        返回:
        the initially requested maximum channel number; zero for unlimited

      • getRequestedFrameMax

        public java.lang.Integer getRequestedFrameMax()
        Retrieve the requested maximum frame size.
        返回:
        the initially requested maximum frame size, in octets; zero for unlimited

      • getRequestedHeartbeat

        public java.lang.Integer getRequestedHeartbeat()
        Retrieve the requested heartbeat interval.
        返回:
        the initially requested heartbeat interval, in seconds; zero for none

      • getConnectionFactory

        public com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory getConnectionFactory()
                                                           throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                  java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                                  java.security.KeyManagementException
        返回:
        Connection Factory for RMQ
        抛出:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if Malformed URI has been passed
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the ssl factory could not be created
        java.security.KeyManagementException - if the ssl context could not be initialized
